code: /** @format */import React from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CardMove=_ref=>{let{item}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-3 col-sm-6 col-12 py-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/movie/".concat(item.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500"+item.poster_path,className:"card__image",alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card__overlay",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"overlay__text text-center w-100 font",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\u0627\u0633\u0645 \u0627\u0644\u0641\u0644\u0645 : ",item.title]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\u062A\u0627\u0631\u064A\u062E \u0627\u0644\u0627\u0635\u062F\u0627\u0631 : ",item.release_date]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\u0627\u0644\u062A\u0642\u064A\u064A\u0645 : ",item.vote_average]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\u0639\u062F\u062F \u0627\u0644\u0645\u0642\u064A\u0645\u064A\u0646 : ",item.vote_count]})]})})]})})});};export default CardMove;
